channel.title: fiction on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in fiction on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.8: Bike writing
item.description: 22nd September 2014 Dear all, How are you? The last couple of weeks have been quieter but no less busy. I’ve been looking for a bike and may get one soon.

item.title: A Brave New World of Equilibrium
item.description: The battle between emotion and control is an old one. It is fought by each of us in our lives as well as philosophers at a more conceptual level.

item.title: Walking Home
item.description: Written in 2003 It was just another day and she was returning from school. After a long ride, the bus reached the last stop. Several students got off along with her.

item.title: Letters from Edinburgh: 4
item.description: **22/09/2009 EDINBURGH PART 4: ZAPPED** Hi! I had my first classes today so after an all-girls Birthday party (of our new American friend) last night with yum brownies, I organised my things for today and slept as early as possible.
